results.content: This course does not have any structure to the presentation.  The instructor jumps back and forth on the screen which doesn't allow me to follow along to then be able to code at the same time.  While there are jump cuts in the video there is no explanation to those cuts, and no explanation as to why the code changed.  The little quizzes are out of order in comparison to the material.  You will be prompted to write code for something which was not mentioned or covered in the previous video.  Overall this course was rushed to publish and needs to be reworked to become a better product.  I would pass on this course to learn JavaScript.

response.content: The course is about creating a memory game please read the course summary.   I'm always online helping students with questions if there is something that was missed please post in the forum so I can properly address it.

results.content: This course did exactly what it stated - showed me how to build a memory game.  The instructor walks you through the game step by step.  A few videos I had to go back and watch again because they moved a little quickly.  I watched the course on my phone, and apparently there were a bunch of coding exercises that don't show up in the mobile app.  Those would have been helpful to see while I was watching - that's a Udemy thing, just something to be aware of.  Overall, pretty good course.

response.content: Excellent - Thank you for providing your feedback and review.  Please let me know if you have any questions.

results.content: This course has a challenging complexity that expanded my JavaScript abilities, yet not overwhelming. I am at a JavaScript intermediate level. Great course. I studied it twice to absorb it's content. It's script uses techniques I did not know "could be utilized".

response.content: Thank you for sharing your review and feedback - best wishes :)

results.content: Overall, good course.  He moves very quickly and as a beginner I had difficulty following him and trying to code along.  Also, the gameboard was build in Bootstrap which I haven't used before.  This was not mentioned in the course description or I may not have purchased it as I haven't used Bootstrap before.  I was therefore, unable to view the game as I followed along through the course, except what the instructor showed on his screen.  I feel like I would have learned even more if I had been able to see my own version progressing as we changed things.

response.content: Thanks for your feedback and review
